title: Google Login (api): Create a single SU user role (ie me) for Mobile Tablet use
body:
I have 3 Drupal project sites that I shall be managing, they all shall use Google sign-in (via the HybridAuth Module) for enduser requirements. However, as an 'Admin' I want to an additional Role for myself (Admin) for roaming on my Tablet.

I have a 4th Drupal site for myself only with a Dashboard linking to 3 other Projects and intend overtime adding all aspects of monitoring such as messaging, spam control, content etc etc with the purpose being that I can monitor all websites activity whilst out and about; ie: in the coffee shops, on the train, friend/family's homes etc, abroad etc.

But for this I want to be able to sign-in with my own personal Google Sign-in whilst at the same time allowing nobody else to sign-in to that domain. I looked at the documentation and presume that the only way (after setting up a specific Credential and Role or Group on my GoogleAPI page, but I'm stuck as what to do next.

Can anyone advise, give me some tips on a general direction?

https://developers.google.com/identity/sign-in/web/devconsole-project

FYI, I run on Ubuntu 16.04 for WebDev on a home desktop.

Thanks in advance.
